verses.verse: And David made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him houses <S%H1004><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, and prepared <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for the ark <S%H727><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and pitched <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for it a tent <S%H168><s%>.

Then David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, None ought to carry <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> but the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>: for them hath the YY <S%H3068><s%> chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and to minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto him for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> together <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, to bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> unto his place <S%H4725><s%>, which he had prepared <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8689><s%> for it.
And David <S%H1732><s%> assembled <S%H622><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>:
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of K'hat <S%H6955><s%>; Uriel <S%H222><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%>:
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of M'rari <S%H4847><s%>; Asaiah <S%H6222><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%>:
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom <S%H1647><s%>; Joel <S%H3100><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%>:
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elizaphan <S%H469><s%>; Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%>:
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hevron <S%H2275><s%>; Eliel <S%H447><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%>:
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>; Amminadab <S%H5992><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for Zadok <S%H6659><s%> and Evyatar <S%H54><s%> the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>, and for the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>, for Uriel <S%H222><s%>, Asaiah <S%H6222><s%>, and Joel <S%H3100><s%>, Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and Eliel <S%H447><s%>, and Amminadab <S%H5992><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Ye are the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>: sanctify <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8690><s%> yourselves, both ye and your brethren <S%H251><s%>, that ye may bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> unto the place that I have prepared <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8689><s%> for it.

For because ye did it not at the first <S%H7223><s%>, the YY <S%H3068><s%> our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> made a breach <S%H6555><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon us, for that we sought <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him not after the due order <S%H4941><s%>.

So the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8691><s%> themselves to bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> bare <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> upon their shoulders <S%H3802><s%> with the staves <S%H4133><s%> thereon, as Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the chief <S%H8269><s%> of the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> to appoint <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8687><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%> to be the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%> with instruments <S%H3627><s%> of musick <S%H7892><s%>, psalteries <S%H5035><s%> and harps <S%H3658><s%> and cymbals <S%H4700><s%>, sounding <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, by lifting up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> with joy <S%H8057><s%>.

So the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> appointed <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Heman <S%H1968><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joel <S%H3100><s%>; and of his brethren <S%H251><s%>, Asaph <S%H623><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah <S%H1296><s%>; and of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of M'rari <S%H4847><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%>, Ethan <S%H387><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kushaiah <S%H6984><s%>;

And with them their brethren <S%H251><s%> of the second <S%H4932><s%> degree, Z'kharyah-yahu <S%H2148><s%>, Ben <S%H1122><s%>, and Jaaziel <S%H3268><s%>, and Shemiramoth <S%H8070><s%>, and Jehiel <S%H3171><s%>, and Unni <S%H6042><s%>, Eliab <S%H446><s%>, and Benaiah <S%H1141><s%>, and Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%>, and Mattithiah <S%H4993><s%>, and Elipheleh <S%H466><s%>, and Mikneiah <S%H4737><s%>, and `Ovededom <S%H5654><s%>, and Jeiel <S%H3273><s%>, the porters <S%H7778><s%>.

So the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%>, Heman <S%H1968><s%>, Asaph <S%H623><s%>, and Ethan <S%H387><s%>, were appointed to sound <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8687><s%> with cymbals <S%H4700><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>;

And Z'kharyah-yahu <S%H2148><s%>, and Aziel <S%H5815><s%>, and Shemiramoth <S%H8070><s%>, and Jehiel <S%H3171><s%>, and Unni <S%H6042><s%>, and Eliab <S%H446><s%>, and Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%>, and Benaiah <S%H1141><s%>, with psalteries <S%H5035><s%> on Alamoth <S%H5961><s%>;

And Mattithiah <S%H4993><s%>, and Elipheleh <S%H466><s%>, and Mikneiah <S%H4737><s%>, and `Ovededom <S%H5654><s%>, and Jeiel <S%H3273><s%>, and Azaziah <S%H5812><s%>, with harps <S%H3658><s%> on the Sheminith <S%H8067><s%> to excel <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8763><s%>.

And Chenaniah <S%H3663><s%>, chief <S%H8269><s%> of the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%>, was for song <S%H4853><s%>: he instructed <S%H3256><s%> about the song <S%H4853><s%>, because he was skilful <S%H995><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.
And Berechiah <S%H1296><s%> and Elkanah <S%H511><s%> were doorkeepers <S%H7778><s%> for the ark <S%H727><s%>.

And SH'vaniah <S%H7645><s%>, and Y'hoshafat <S%H3146><s%>, and Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%>, and Amasai <S%H6022><s%>, and Z'kharyah-yahu <S%H2148><s%>, and Benaiah <S%H1141><s%>, and Eliezer <S%H461><s%>, the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>, did blow <S%H2690><s%> <S%H8688><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H2690><s%> <S%H8764><s%> with the shofars <S%H2689><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: and `Ovededom <S%H5654><s%> and Jehiah <S%H3174><s%> were doorkeepers <S%H7778><s%> for the ark <S%H727><s%>.

So David <S%H1732><s%>, and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and the captains <S%H8269><s%> over thousands <S%H505><s%>, went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of `Ovededom <S%H5654><s%> with joy <S%H8057><s%>.

And it came to pass, when 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> helped <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> that bare <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that they offered <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> was clothed <S%H3736><s%> <S%H8794><s%> with a robe <S%H4598><s%> of fine linen <S%H948><s%>, and all the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> that bare <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>, and the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%>, and Chenaniah <S%H3663><s%> the master <S%H8269><s%> of the song <S%H4853><s%> with the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8789><s%>: David <S%H1732><s%> also had upon him an ephod <S%H646><s%> of linen <S%H906><s%>.

Thus all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> with shouting <S%H8643><s%>, and with sound <S%H6963><s%> of the cornet <S%H7782><s%>, and with shofars <S%H2689><s%>, and with cymbals <S%H4700><s%>, making a noise <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8688><s%> with psalteries <S%H5035><s%> and harps <S%H3658><s%>.

And it came to pass, as the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, that Mikhal <S%H4324><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> looking out <S%H8259><s%> <S%H8738><s%> at a window <S%H2474><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> dancing <S%H7540><s%> <S%H8764><s%> and playing <S%H7832><s%> <S%H8764><s%>: and she despised <S%H959><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him in her heart <S%H3820><s%>.
